Class OrderItem

java.lang.Object
edu.tamu.csce331.sharetea.models.OrderItem
public class OrderItem extends Object
Order item model representing individual items in a customer order in the Sharetea POS system.

This class encapsulates order item information including menu item details, quantity, pricing, customization options, and preparation tracking. Order items represent the individual products selected by customers and are linked to both orders and menu items.

Key features:

  • Menu item association and pricing
  • Quantity management and calculation
  • Customization options storage
  • Preparation tracking and timing
  • Subtotal calculation and management

Order items support various customization options such as:

  • Size variations (small, medium, large)
  • Sweetness levels and ice preferences
  • Additional toppings and modifications
  • Special preparation instructions
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderItem

      public OrderItem()
      Default constructor for OrderItem.

      Creates a new OrderItem instance with default values. This constructor is typically used when creating new order items that will be populated with data from user input or database operations.

    • OrderItem

      public OrderItem(Long orderId, Long menuItemId, Integer quantity, BigDecimal unitPrice)
      Constructs an OrderItem with specified order and menu item information.

      This constructor is used when creating a new order item with known order and menu item details. The subtotal is automatically calculated based on quantity and unit price, and the creation timestamp is set.

      Parameters:
      orderId - the identifier of the order this item belongs to
      menuItemId - the identifier of the menu item
      quantity - the quantity of this item
      unitPrice - the unit price for this item
